bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
I'm using the latest version of PL. My problem is when I launch an experiment, everything is logged correctly to tensorboard, except the hparams: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22404728/85848735-f2422a80-b7a9-11ea-80f6-96ab9d6a4a61.png></denchmark-link>
